description: Similar to how the libvirt and xenapi drivers need to communicate the quantum port-id (aka the nova vif_uuid when quantum is in use) to the compute layer in order to identify each vNIC, vmwareapi needs to do the same.
title: make vmwareapi driver pass quantum port-id to ESX

comments.content: Similar to how the libvirt and xenapi drivers need to communicate the quantum port-id (aka the nova vif_uuid when quantum is in use) to the compute layer in order to identify each vNIC, vmwareapi needs to do the same.

commit ac7188f330683ce480b7b362997ec88b151b9749
Author: Dan Wendlandt <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Feb 10 15:51:19 2013 -0800

    make vmwareapi driver pass quantum port-id to ESX
    
    bug 1121349
    
    Similar to how the libvirt and xenapi drivers need to communicate
    the quantum port-id (aka the nova vif_uuid when quantum is in use)
    to the compute layer in order to identify each vNIC, vmwareapi
    needs to do the same.
    
    Change-Id: I8b4bf81bfbad63e61a6ade9f0173e478b3aa45bd
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
